params.name: createdBy
params.doc: Site member ID of group admin.

description: Group managers always have access to this functionality. In some cases, site owners will allow site members to use this functionality as well.
Specify a `creatorId` to set the group's creator, who will be added as a group admin.
Group managers and group admins have access to this functionality.
The group will no longer be accessible in the live site or the Wix business manager.

params.name: slug
params.doc: Slug (part of a group's URL, e.g., 'https:/example.com/groups/{slug}'). Pass only the slug. Case-sensitive.

docs.summary: Retrieves a list of up to 100 groups across the site.
description: Groups managers can see all existing groups.

ret.doc:
Contains functionality for refining a groups query.
The `GroupsQueryBuilder` functions enable you to run, sort, filter, and control
which results a query returns.

Typically, you build a query using any of the groups query functions,
refine the query by chaining `GroupsQueryBuilder` functions, and then execute the
query by chaining the [`find()`](#find) function.

For example, the following code queries...:

```javascript
import wixGroupsBackend from 'wix-groups-backend';

wixGroupsBackend.queryGroups()
  .eq("<property1>", "<value1>")
  .ascending("<property2>")
  .limit(5)
  .find()
  .then( (results) => {
    console.log(results.items);
  } );
```

docs.summary: Retrieves a list of up to 100 groups across a site.
description: Groups managers can see all groups.
Group managers and group admins have access to this functionality.
When `group.privacyLevel` is updated from `PRIVATE` to `PUBLIC`, all pending group join requests are automatically approved.
When `group.privacyLevel` is updated from `PRIVATE` to `SECRET`, all pending group join requests are automatically rejected.

members.name: slug
members.doc: A unique part of a group's URL (e.g., 'https:/example.com/groups/slug').

members.name: privacyStatus
members.doc:
Group privacy level.
- `PUBLIC` - Anyone can see group in groups list and its content. Anyone can join group.
- `PRIVATE` - Anyone can see group in groups list, but only group members can see its content. In order to join group, a group join request should be submitted.
- `SECRET` - Only group members and a groups manager can see group in group list. New group members can only be added by other group members.
One of:
 + `"UNKNOWN"`
 + `"PUBLIC"`
 + `"PRIVATE"`
 + `"SECRET"`

members.name: lastActivityDate
members.doc: Date and time the group was last active (e.g., last post or comment).

members.name: createdBy
members.doc: Site member ID of the group creator.

docs.summary: The `options` parameter is an optional parameter that can be used when calling the query [`find()`](#find) function.

members.name: suppressAuth
members.doc: When `true`, prevents permission checks from running for the operation.
